meaning: Her grace falls instantly on those who practice ‘rahoyāga’ and offer ‘रहस्तर्पणऽ (‘rahastarpaṇa’) (see names 381, 382)
commentary: Peace (shanti) is the real blessing that She gives. Peace is not an object that can be procured externally; it is exclusively an internal state. The Divine Mother through Her immense grace causes this peace to be experienced by us.
